body:
hi Nico, the failure seems to be in the interopTestRemote, which actually
tries to access a remote server. This could be the result of flaky network.
I will disable this test for now and see if flake goes away.

On Thu, Apr 7, 2016 at 11:16 AM, Nicolas Noble notifications@github.com
wrote:

> https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/grpc_master_test/config=opt,language=objc,platform=macos/
> 
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/6117
I confirmed that this flake happens on my macbook as well. Roughly 1 in 5 times.

Attaching the full client log from a failed test.
[failed_log.txt](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/files/224378/failed_log.txt)

These are the relevant parts:

```
I0418 10:34:35.088334000 4508401664 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f8239542000, nops=1, tag=0x7f82395414a0, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.088488000 4508401664 call.c:1185] ops[0]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA
I0418 10:34:35.088703000 4508401664 client_channel.c:109] OP[client-channel:0x7f823a00d380]: SEND_INITIAL_METADATA{key=3a 70 61 74 68 ':path' value=2f 67 72 70 63 2e 74 65 73 74 69 6e 67 2e 54 65 73 74 53 65 72 76 69 63 65 2f 45 6d 70 74 79 43 61 6c 6c '/grpc.testing.TestService/EmptyCall', key=3a 61 75 74 68 6f 72 69 74 79 ':authority' value=67 72 70 63 2d 74 65 73 74 2e 73 61 6e 64 62 6f 78 2e 67 6f 6f 67 6c 65 61 70 69 73 2e 63 6f 6d 'grpc-test.sandbox.googleapis.com', key=67 72 70 63 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 'identity', key=67 72 70 63 2d 61 63 63 65 70 74 2d 65 6e 63 6f 64 69 6e 67 'grpc-accept-encoding' value=69 64 65 6e 74 69 74 79 2c 64 65 66 6c 61 74 65 2c 67 7a 69 70 'identity,deflate,gzip'}
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.089161000 4508401664 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f82397bae30, nops=1, tag=0x7f82397bae80, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.089326000 4508401664 call.c:1185] ops[0]: RECV_INITIAL_METADATA ptr=0x7f8239542730
I0418 10:34:35.089455000 4508401664 client_channel.c:109] OP[client-channel:0x7f823a00d380]: RECV_INITIAL_METADATA
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.089773000 4508401664 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f82397bae30, nops=1, tag=0x7f82397baf30, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.089921000 4508401664 call.c:1185] ops[0]: RECV_STATUS_ON_CLIENT metadata=0x7f82394c6f98 status=0x7f82394c6f80 details=0x7f82394c6f88
I0418 10:34:35.090055000 4508401664 client_channel.c:109] OP[client-channel:0x7f823a00d380]: RECV_TRAILING_METADATA

I0418 10:34:35.090397000 123145303453696 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f823bb00dc0, nops=1, tag=0x7f823bb00e10, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.090563000 123145303453696 call.c:1185] ops[0]: SEND_MESSAGE ptr=0x7f82394c7240
I0418 10:34:35.090759000 123145303453696 client_channel.c:109] OP[client-channel:0x7f823a00d380]: SEND_MESSAGE:flags=0x00000000:len=0
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.187737000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f82395414a0 OK <<SEND_INITIAL_METADATA>>

I0418 10:34:35.187854000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f823bb00e10 OK <<SEND_MESSAGE>>

I0418 10:34:35.187946000 123145303453696 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f82394ca760, nops=1, tag=0x7f82394c7350, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.188004000 123145303453696 call.c:1185] ops[0]: SEND_CLOSE_FROM_CLIENT
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.188339000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f82394c7350 OK <<SEND_CLOSE_FROM_CLIENT>>
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.575792000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f82397bae80 OK <<RECV_INITIAL_METADATA>>

I0418 10:34:35.576128000 123145303453696 call.c:1473] grpc_call_start_batch(call=0x7f823a00ce00, ops=0x7f8239548ba0, nops=1, tag=0x7f8239548bf0, reserved=0x0)
I0418 10:34:35.576259000 123145303453696 call.c:1185] ops[0]: RECV_MESSAGE ptr=0x7f8239548b10
I0418 10:34:35.576391000 123145303453696 client_channel.c:109] OP[client-channel:0x7f823a00d380]: RECV_MESSAGE
D0418 10:34:35.576396000 123145305063424 tcp_posix.c:163] read: success=1
I0418 10:34:35.576525000 123145303453696 http_client_filter.c:143] OP[http-client:0x7f823a816c50]: RECV_MESSAGE
D0418 10:34:35.576559000 123145305063424 tcp_posix.c:167] READ 0x7f82394c9410: 17 03 03 00 2e 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 06 0c e5 50 50 75 57 50 1a 63 94 0c 5e 73 d1 9a 7c 49 e9 1e 3a a1 aa ed 73 62 f6 3e 76 e3 5b e7 e2 e4 ad 57 e8 25 59 17 03 03 00 29 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 90 7e 80 6d d6 e5 19 40 e4 41 64 65 02 a0 1c f3 19 7c 66 1f 39 f5 6d ae 8f ec 86 63 e7 07 06 4e 56 '...............PPuWP.c..^s..|I..:...sb.>v.[....W.%Y....).........~.m...@.Ade.....|f.9.m....c...NV'
I0418 10:34:35.576645000 123145303453696 connected_channel.c:70] OP[connected:0x7f823a816c68]: RECV_MESSAGE
D0418 10:34:35.576685000 123145305063424 secure_endpoint.c:135] READ 0x7f82396124d0: 00 00 0d 01 05 00 00 00 01 40 88 9a ca c8 b2 12 34 da 8f 01 30 cb 00 00 08 06 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 '.........@......4...0..................'
```

```
I0418 10:34:35.576852000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f82397baf30 OK <<RECV_STATUS_ON_CLIENT>>
```

```
/Users/makarandd/Work/gitx/grpc_flake_debug/src/objective-c/tests/InteropTests.m:100: error: -[InteropTestsRemote testEmptyUnaryRPC] : ((error) == nil) failed: "Error Domain=io.grpc Code=13 "The writer finished without producing any value." UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=The wri \

I0418 10:34:35.577315000 123145305063424 completion_queue.c:346] RETURN_EVENT[0x7f823960c130]: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x7f8239548bf0 OK \ <<RECV_MESSAGE>>

ter finished without producing any value.}" - Finished with unexpected error: Error Domain=io.grpc Code=13 "The writer finished without producing any value." UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=The writer finished without producing any value.}

```
`RECV_MESSAGE` shows up in the completion queue after `RECV_STATUS_ON_CLIENT`, which triggers the call to finish before producing a response.

For reference, these are the 6 ops performed during a unary call:

`GRPCOpSendMetadata`
`GRPCOpSendMessage`
`GRPCOpSendClose`

`GRPCOpRecvMetadata`
`GRPCOpRecvMessage`
`GRPCOpRecvStatus`
